alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Greenwood (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 9:32PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville, eastern Anderson, northeastern Abbeville and northwestern Greenwood Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 932 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Honea Path, or 14 miles west of Laurens, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fountain Inn, Ware Shoals, Gray Court, Fork Shoals, Princeton, and Hickory Tavern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
